Game Description:

Magicite is an epic 2D RPG game that you can play singleplayer or with your friends. Venture out into randomized instances and get loot and materials to craft new armor and weapons. But be careful, as permadeath is a huge part of the game.

Players will create characters with randomly generated stats, traits, and appearances. These characters will go on to explore randomized instances to collect resources, battle enemies, and level up to acquire new skills! After each instance, players and their party will stumble upon randomly generated towns filled with various NPCs that offer unique and helpful services. Here is where you sell your loot, craft gear, and prepare your party for the next dangerous adventure.
